title: testIdea
description: test descirption

title: Organic Stoneground Flakes
description: First organic stoneground wheat flakes on the market, made with only three ingredients - organic stoneground flakes, organic cane sugar, and a pinch of sea salt.  The goal is to create a vision of undoing food, going back to the roots, and inspiring a new generation that wholesome, simple foods can be delicious and fun too!

title: Bundle Organics
description: Bundle Organics is the very first line of pasteurized, organic juices designed especially for expecting & new moms.  The juices are made with USDA organic, non-GMO fruits and veggies, and fortified with OBGYN-recommended nutrients that complement prenatal vitamins.

title: Bundle Organics Juice
description: Bundle Organics is the very first line of pasteurized, organic juices designed especially for expecting & new moms.  Our juices are made with USDA organic, non-GMO fruits and veggies, and fortified with OBGYN-recommended nutrients that complement prenatal vitamins. Bundle Organics the only organic, consumable brand that allows expecitng moms to safely enjoy the juice trend, while getting the nutrients she needs when she needs it most.

title: Bubi Water Bottle
description: This water bottle is a "scrunchable" water bottle that can fit in your pocket.  It is bpa-free and the bottle is microwave/freezer/dishwasher safe.  It is extremely easy to clean because you can just turn the bottle inside out.

title: CleanSmart Pet Cleaner
description: CleanSmart Pet Care Products are the first pet products that clean and disinfect.  CleanSmart is EPA approved to kill 99.9% of germs, yet contains no harmful chemicals or harsh fumes, and it is gentle enough to use on chew toys.  It is the first disinfectant product the EPA has awarded "no pet licking worries" claim.

title: GRAYL Water Bottle
description: The GRAYL is a water bottle filtration system where you can fill the bottle with water from anywhere.  You then press the filter down into the cup and you have clean water to drink.  It works like a french press.

title: Further Products
description: This is a company that had an idea to take waste grease from local restaurants and put the biofuel to use by turning it into soap, hand lotion, a dish soap, and two candles.  The idea is taking waste and turning it into great product.  Today they sell the same product in hotels, restaurants, and retailers nationwide.

title: BagSavr Trash Can
description: BagSavr is a patented trash can that is designed to hold your Target bags as a resuable trash bag.  It has handles on the sides that hold the bag handles along with a pouch in front to hold the additional Target bags.  It is small and can fit or attach in multiple areas of your home.

title: bitybean baby carrier
description: The Bitybean baby carrier weighs a total of 8 oz and can roll up into a carrier that can be tucked into a pocket, bag, or purse.  It can be used for toddlers 3 months and up and weighing 8 to 40 pounds.

title: Paint Brush Cover
description: The Paint Brush Cover is made of clear, hard, durable plastic and it allows you to place your paint brushes inside of it wet or dry and it will create an airtight seal to protect the brush.  This allows you to not clean your brush if you have to take a break during the project and it allows your brushes to last longer.

title: Zipsak
description: The Zipsak is a piece of luggage that can shrink down to the size of a briefcase bag for easy storage, but can expand out to a full suitcase with rollers with just enough space as a normal bag. This item was seen on Shark Tank.

title: Bantam Bagels
description: Bantam Bagels are New York style mini stuffed bagel balls.  They are crispy and chewy and are stuffed with artisan cream cheeses.  Some of the sample flavors include hot pretzel, plain cream cheese, French toast, cookies and milk.

title: Nuts N' More
description: Nuts N' More is a line of high protein spreads that was created because a group of athletes was looking for a healthy alternative of getting protein into their diets without having to eat another bar or drink another shake.  Flavors include almond butter, chocolate almond, cinnamon raisin, chocolate peanut, etc...

title: Fantabulous Water Blob
description: This is a gigantic plastic pillow that you fill with water.  You can jump on it, roll on it, or bounce on it.  The cool water inside keeps you cool on hot days and you can open up holes on the surface that will cause water to squirt out.

title: Toobeez
description: Toobeez is an active play item that comes with a bunch of rods and connectors that allows you to build multiple things to play with like hurdles, goals, hideaways, forts, windmills, etc...

title: Bungee Ball
description: It is a combination of Volleyball and Tetherball.  It has the ball tethered to a string but you still hit it back and forth over the net.  This idea is also in concept phase.

title: jamstik+
description: jamstik+ brings the joy of learning to play guitar to a new generation through technology.  It's compact size allows for on-the-go fun. Apps guide you from how to hold a pick correctly, all the way to playing your first song. jamstik+ is for current, aspring, or even professional musicians.  Through hundreds of compatible apps, jamstik+ continues to reinvent itself.

title: Cart Meals Ã¢â‚¬â€œ Curated Healthy Recipes on Carthweel
description: Moderate and Proactive Demanding Enthusiasts are deeply concerned with healthy eating decisions, but struggle to consistently make these right choices due to lack of proactive investigation, fear of higher prices in healthier food options and limited interaction on accepted mediums at point of conflict, causing detrimental choices related to food quality.

title: Just For You Portable Health Guide
description: Many younger Target guests donÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t have healthy role models to from whom they can learn how to eat and live well. Some Target guests are confused by conflicting information about what is Ã¢â‚¬Å“healthyÃ¢â‚¬Â, or are overwhelmed by the sheer volume of information about health and wellness currently available. Still other guests want to make positive changes to improve their wellness, but donÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t have the time or patience to sort through volumes of information in order to make the decisions that will lead them down the path of good health. The Just For You Portable Health Guide addresses all of these barriers to improving personal health and wellness.

title: Well. Done!  Fresh-prepped meals boxed at your local Target.
description: The market is flooded with unhealthy but convenient dinner options whether you eat in or out.  Parents with little time and/or skill still want to cook wholesome and complete meals for their families.  Ready-to-cook options are often full of preservatives or have had much of the taste frozen out of them.  When a healthy meal is cooked at home it usually requires advance planning Ã¢â‚¬â€œ what to make, ingredients to get, thawing meat in time, etc. There exists a need for fast, fresh home-cooked meals that are uncompromising in taste, quality and nutritional value without having to think too hard about how to accomplish it.

title: DriverÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s Seat: The app that syncs the authenticity of healthy recipe discovery with the benefits of TargetÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s promotional vehicles.
description:
The core consumer (Elizabeth) aspires for a sense of balance in her life and control over her familyÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s and her own well being.



She aims to instill healthy eating habits on her family, but as the primary grocery shopper and meal preparer, she is intimidated by the perceived time and money associated with healthy cooking, as well as her lack of knowledge on healthy eating.

title: Easy Eats: save well, eat well, be well
description: Dana has a family and is digitally connected Ã¢â‚¬â€œ using her smartphone to find tips and ideas for living a healthy lifestyle.  She feels like a good parent when she finds healthy food choices for her family, but sheÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s overwhelmed with how stressful it can be to find and prepare the right meals AND get to her fitness class.  The effort she puts in leaves her without the time and energy that she needs to focus on the other well-being priorities in her life.

title: Organic Food Finder
description:
***To skip the description and get right to the video, click the vimeo link at the bottom of the page. Use the password: crowd***

Many of our Guests care about organic and natural groceries, but donÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t realize how many options Target actually carries, because those items are spread outÃ¢â‚¬â€essentially Ã¢â‚¬Å“hiddenÃ¢â‚¬Â amongst all our other products throughout the grocery department. As a result, we believe many of them have to make an extra trip to Whole Foods for just a few organic items to finish their shopping list. This increases their budget for groceries and the number of items on their "To-Do" list. Getting everything they need at Target, in one place, saves time and money.

title: ClickCart
description:
***PLEASE WATCH VIDEO AT BOTTOM OF PAGE*** (password: crowd)

The Target guest has an overwhelming amount of healthy ideas and inspiration, but due to lack a socially integrated retail experience, has trouble making these recipes come to life.

ClickCart is the first platform to combine:
- Social Media Inspiration
- Online Grocery Shopping
- Pick up in store technology

title: Target Chef
description:
****Please see our video using the link at the bottom or going directly to https://vimeo.com/118864856 (password="crowd")*****

Meet Jane, a busy, young professional mother of two, who is passionate about living well. She strives to reduce her stress, spend quality time with her family and provide healthy meals for them. She gets overwhelmed with the entire process of planning and preparing healthy meals, which takes away from her ability to spend time with her family. She becomes paralyzed by the countless recipes on the internet that have too many ingredients or are so complex they take hours to prepare. As a result, she resorts to the same (not so healthy) meals she always prepares which require less creativity, effort and money.

She needs to be able to prepare a healthy meal in a stress-free way and spend quality time with her family.

title: Connected Care
description:
****** PLEASE WATCH OUR VIDEO IN LINK BELOW ********

While moms do everything in their power to keep their children healthy, they worry about those moments of the unknown. Whether an expecting mother wonders when she last felt her babyÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s kick or her infant cries inconsolably at 3AM, there are so many moments where mom aspires for peace of mind that everything is okay. She struggles with the stress of the unknown and wonÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t rest until she can diagnose or treat her children, even if itÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s ahead of her own needs. She needs the tools to act in those moments, ultimately empowering her and delivering her the peace of mind she needs.

title: PowerChips -  Move, Earn, Game
description: We know that physical activity produces overall physical, psychological and social benefits, and that inactive children are likely to become inactive adults (from NFL Play60).  Many children spend their inactive time playing video games and apps.  While some game makers have attempted to increase the amount of movement involved in playing their games (Wii, Kinect, etc.), the amount of physical activity involved in playing these games is minimal.  There exists an opportunity to better connect active play with video games, a way to encourage the young gamers to get up and play in the real world.  The PowerChip Active does just this, by tracking the amount of time the child is actively moving during the day, the child earns in-game rewards, called PowerChips.

title: Well by Target. Mobile FitnessÃ¢â‚¬Â¦Anytime
description: For time-starved individuals who want to maintain a workout routine without taking time away from other meaningful activities, Well by Target provides conveniently scheduled, capacity-controlled classes that you can join with your friends from anywhere you are, with a live trainer able to give you real-time feedback.

title: Target Plate
description: Our guest Taylor tries her best to live up to her values and ambitions by eating healthy, sustainable food, but with a busy schedule and no culinary training, she lacks the time and expertise to prepare meals that match her aspirations and tastes. She is also overwhelmed by all the food options available to Ã¢â‚¬â€œ both when choosing where to shop and eat, and when shopping the aisles of Whole Foods or Target. As a result, she often ends up settling for meals that are uninspiring, unhealthy, and/or expensive. Target Plate allows Taylor to have it all: healthy, delicious, sustainable food at an affordable price that fits into her busy schedule.

title: Wellness ONE SCAN Plan  - Please view URL: https://sway.com/fFmO4Vi0rzEHw87o
description: Consumers that are looking to track their food purchases and financial history can do so with one barcode scan.

title: Target EZ Meals
description: Meet Ben, a recent college graduate who is now tossed into the real world where magical dining halls and college days of ramen don't exist anymore.  Ben has been living off of frozen foods and takeout for months because he can't cook.  After feeling the impact of his food choices causing him to have less energy at work - not to mention his hurting wallet - he has decided to make a change.  He wants to create his own meals and save money while he pays off his college loans.

title: Target Neighborhood Events (TNE's)
description: The Target guest is searching for free and convenient community events & activities that can educate, inspire, and engage  their families while helping them to make smarter choices about the things they feel support their wellness.  Target is searching for ways to integrate our 1800+ neighborhood stores into the community to help drive store traffic and make Target a destination for the guest.

title: It All Starts with a Lemon
description:
Many of our guests want to lead healthier lifestyles but believe that healthier options are too expensive and confusing to navigate. Target can make Wellness accessible to guests by making organics more affordable and acting as a trusted partner to help the guest switch to healthier options.

Please watch our video to see how it all starts with a lemon!

title: Target Steps
description:
*Please view video (link at the bottom)

Emily is a busy new mom. Her day is constantly filled with numerous choices. Should she let her baby sleep a little longer or wake her up and run to Target? Should she volunteer or make it home to put her baby down for nap time? Clip coupons or put together that new toy? This can be very demanding. While she knows how important it is for her to fit exercising and finding more ways to save money into her day, this just isn't currently possible. Emily wishes there was a way to integrate these healthy behaviors into her already full day and model them to her baby while taking some of the guesswork out of deciding how to fit them in.

title: Target Wellness Program
description:
Video URL: https://vimeo.com/118947634

Our end user is Scott, a health-conscious, millennial father and family budget owner who often puts his family needs ahead of his own. He loves Target, loves to shop, and loves finding a good deal.

ScottÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s definition of wellness is maintaining Ã¢â‚¬Å“holistic balanceÃ¢â‚¬Â in his life which incorporates everything from healthy eating and regular exercise to spending quality time with his family. Though, in ScottÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s words, Ã¢â‚¬Å“Exercising regularly and eating healthy foods are the two biggest components of wellness for me.Ã¢â‚¬Â

Scott needs a way to help provide consistent, holistic, balanced wellness for himself and for his family. But frustratingly, he struggles to find the personal motivation to consistently exercise and also the ability to provide more affordable, healthy food options for his family.

title: Wellness Hub
description:
Wellness cannot be summed up by one action alone. For many people it is a sum total of eating healthy, physical fitness and relationships being in balance or a place of peace. Regardless of where the Guest fell on the Ã¢â‚¬Å“Wellness SpectrumÃ¢â‚¬Â the recurring theme of the following three basic barriers surfaced.

Lack of information, time and connection stands in the way of achieving wellness.

title: Sport Specific Nutrition
description: Not all calories are created equal, especially when we think about sports and performance.  Parents have the motivation to help their kids advance their athletic performance but donÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t have the knowledge.  We want to enhance our/our childrenÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s performance rather than simply filling our/their stomachs.

title: Healthy Corner. ItÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s as easy as 1, 2, 3.
description: Consumers have the desire to eat healthy.  However, due to time constraints and lack of guidance they find it difficult to come up with quick and healthy food options.  They rely on quick meals via restaurants due to their frustration of grocery shopping and lack of diverse and easy meal ideas.

title: FINANCIAL WELLNESS:  EDUCATION SAVING PLAN USING THEIR REDCARD
description: Financial saving for college is a task that is always on 'the list'. This program will start and consistently add funds to the childÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s post-secondary education and make saving money an easy process.

title: Cartwheel Healthy Connect
description:
Individual health is at the foundation of day to day life; impacting every aspect of life from work to family to recreation, good health is transformative. Yet, acting alone, without reinforcing social and economic environments, no individual can achieve their optimal health.
It isnÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t a simple matter of motivation; the context of peopleÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s lives determines their health: income and social status, education, physical activity, social support networks, genetics and access to healthy environments are the true determinants of individual health.
We know our guests are proactive health consumers who care about the health of themselves and their families. The demographic of our guest (with above average education and above average income) means that many of these determinants of health (such as income, social status, education) are relatively constant but an important problem persists: at the point in time when guests are making choices on products that will impact their health, they lack the key social network and incentive that will reinforce the healthy choice.
Enter Cartwheel Healthy Connect. By harnessing the popularity and footprint of Cartwheel and combining it with behavioral science, Cartwheel Healthy Connect reinforces the guest in making healthy choices by winning on price and winning at health.

title: Target Lifestyle
description:
Wellness for people can mean many different things but at its core people want to live a healthy life. There are endless options for people to choose from but they have trouble finding motivation, the right type of activities, healthy food alternatives and they lack time to figure it all out alone. With Target Lifestyle, Target will help you learn more about yourself, help make the best choices to live a healthy life that fits your style! Target will be the partner everyone needs in their wellness journey.
Take Jackie, she is an active and social individual who isnÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t a traditional gym goer that needs help finding undiscovered way to continue her journey living well and eating healthy. She is bored with her routine and lacks the knowledge and time to do something that feels more fulfilling. With Target Lifestyle, she is given activities tailored to her interests and tips to keep her wellness journey fresh. First using the wellness quiz she, is given activities that fit her lifestyle and preferences. It then connects her to products and grocery items with meal recipes that will make her life easier. Creating a community is also a large part, Target will host special wellness events around the city that will bring her and people like her together.

title: Target To Table - Easy Dinner Brought to Your Car
description:
WhatÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s for dinner?

Every day, this simple question strikes a lightning rod of stress and guilt into the heart of a working parent.Target To Table gives our guest a chance to make a healthy, yummy dinner at home without the hassle of planning, shopping or doing too much cooking.
Meet Emily - She knows that her kids need fresh, healthy food. She knows about the studies- kids who eat dinner with their family at home get better grades and are less likely to do drugs. She wants that happy life for her kids more than she wants happiness for herself, she plans family vacations months in advance and drives across town for swimming lessons in a heated salt water pool, yet there never seems to be time to plan for a healthy dinner she can feel proud of.
Nearly every night Emily feels like the worst mom in the world, as she orders pizza or Bite Squad, or pulls into DQ for chicken fingers. She wants to change, she wants to give her kids great food every night but just doesnÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t have the time to think ahead to plan and cook healthy dinners.

title: Target Wellness App
description: Sam is a 24 year old young professional who moved to a new city and is establishing their new identity. Sam came from a home that did not value healthy habits, but he now values the idea of being healthy. Sam wants to be healthy and environmentally conscious but does not know how to start, nor has the time, inspiration, or resources. Sam needs a convenient way to adopt healthy habits that align with his goal of having a healthy and eco-friendly lifestyle.

title: Meal Planning Made Easy!
description: Lack of time within our busy lifestyles and costs for organic, whole foods can be a contributing factor in making poor food choices. Additionally, meal preparation is time consuming and can be costly. A meal preparation app can minimizes preparation, organization and time to plan and execute healthy meals each week for individuals and their families while also providing a seamless guest experience, healthy products and options!

title: Healthy Kids Licensed Meal
description:
**** WATCH OUR VIDEO: https://vimeo.com/118965884 ***





Wellness Wendy is motivated to help her family eat well, but her kids refuse when she tries to serve them healthy alternatives. Our concept associates popular kidsÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ brands/characters with healthy foods to increase consumption and remove the guilt that is experienced when she is forced to serve less healthy options. These popular brands/characters possess the highest level of credibility with kids, and our concept lends Ã¢â‚¬Å“magical powersÃ¢â‚¬Â to Wendy during mealtime.

title: Healthy Meal Solutions
description:
Please view video: https://vimeo.com/118962135 password "crowd"

Meet Molly. Molly is a 30 something working mom who struggles to find the time and motivation to cook nutritious, good tasting meals that her family will actually eat. She dreads weekend grocery shopping with her children and feels defeated and guilty when she resorts to fast food meals for convenience.

title: Hello. Healthy.  Fresh Organic Meal Options
description: Consumer research indicates that while guestsÃ¢â‚¬â€and especially MillennialsÃ¢â‚¬â€care about eating fresh, healthy, organic meals, they lack the ability, inspiration and time to make planning, shopping for and preparing meals a daily priority.  Guests increasingly look to their primary grocery to help navigate food-based wellness and as a resource for outsourcing meal preparation.  Retailers who are successful in fulfilling this need experience an uplift in their credibility as a trusted wellness source across assortments.

title: Be Well - Wellness App integrated within Target Healthful
description:
Video Link: https://vimeo.com/119090949
pw: crowd

Everyone wants to be their best version of Ã¢â‚¬Å“well.Ã¢â‚¬Â But what does well mean? For some being well may be eating better and getting to the gym if they havenÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t been there for a while. For others it may mean being civic-minded and volunteering at their local shelter or donating extra clothes they have around their house. Since being well means something different to everyone, providing a cookie-cutter, one-size-fits-all wellness plan doesnÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t work. People want to make their own wellness choices based on whatÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s most important to them and fits into their busy lifestyles. They just need a little help.

title: [Project Title] TBD Hope you like the concept anyway
description:
Riley, our tech-savvy digitally connected guest, knows what he needs to do to be healthy. He is up on wellness trends and knows that he wants to have a better balanced lifestyle. Unfortunately, Riley doesnÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t have a way to get there. When he is faced with tough choices, Riley doesnÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t always have the time or energy to make the best decision. Often times his decisions donÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t line up with his aspirational goals.
He needs a way to believe that a healthy lifestyle is attainable, but feels discouraged in the face of past failures and the perceived time and effort necessary to make sustained lifestyle changes.

title: Vitamin Deficiency Status and Solution
description: Our guests love vitamins and they know that their bodies aren't getting enough. The problem is they don't know what they're lacking in or what would help them lead healthier lives. So what if we could help them identify their deficiencies and direct them to the Target solution?

title: Recipes
description:
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Not knowing what to cook
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Not knowing the nutrition of meal options
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Not having time to plan healthy meals
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Not having time to convert recipes into shopping lists
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Not knowing where products are located
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Not knowing if recipe ingredients are discounted on Cartwheel

title: Get Better Kits
description: Here's the deal.  You're a busy Mom/Dad and little Charlie is sick.  Not sick enough to go to the doctor or clinic, but just miserable enough to need something to ease some of the symptoms.

title: Target Rx Tracker
description: Guests do not know the status of their prescription while waiting.  We send text alerts, but guests still check back at the pharmacy to see if it is ready.  This creates congestion around the pharmacy and lines appear unorganized and haphazard.  We do a good job of letting guests know when their prescription is ready, but not a good job letting them know the status along the way, especially if there is an issue that may cause a delay (insurance error, have to call doctor)

title: Green Dry Cleaner @ Target
description:
Consumer Problem: Consumers do not have a convenient way to get their clothing dry cleaned in an environmentally friendly, sustainable manner.

Target Problem: Target is looking to drive additional traffic by providing a product or service that guests desire and strengthens the link to our brandÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s wellness initiative.

Concept: Create a green, one-hour dry cleaning service that allows guests the opportunity to complete their weekly shopping trip while taking care of their laundry.
